articles.title: With Drake Maye, and good health rest of the way, Patriots should be considered Super Bowl contenders
articles.description:
Not only did Maye pass his biggest test yet against the Buccaneers — a road game, in unfavorable weather, against a relentless and darned good defense — but he changed the conversation.

The post With Drake Maye, and good health rest of the way, Patriots should be considered Super Bowl contenders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Drake Maye led the Patriots to a crucial win against the Buccaneers.
Maye's performance in adverse conditions boosts Super Bowl contender discussions.
Increased optimism among Boston fans as Patriots aim for postseason success.
